title: Trump isolated after trade escalation with Europe over Greenland
subhead: The president's threats could undermine the agreement reached by the United States and the European Union in the summer of 2025.

title: French PM announces taxes on large companies to break budget deadlock
Spain promises answers as high-speed train crash kills 39
The strange airborne rescue of Gaza's donkeys, from Israel to Europe
subhead: Since 2022, Sharon Cohen, who runs an animal rescue group near Tel Aviv, has removed donkeys from Palestinian owners she accuses of mistreatment and sent them to shelters across Europe. The initiative has drawn outrage amid Gaza's deepening humanitarian crisis.

title: Cynthia Miller-Idriss, sociologist: 'Far-right violence is now official US government policy and practice'
subhead: When the poet Renee Nicole Good was killed during a protest against Immigration and Customs Enforcement, the federal government defended the killer.

title: Gen Z thirsts for a digital detox: 'I felt bad after every use, quitting lifted a huge weight off me'
subhead: More and more young people are feeling dependent on their screens, and taking steps to regain control over their digital device use by deleting social media apps and limiting their screen time.

title: The Kurdish dream of autonomy in Syria ends
subhead: Under pressure from advancing government forces, the head of the Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF), Mazloum Abdi, signed an agreement with Syrian President Ahmed al-Sharaa formalizing the restoration of Damascus's authority over northeastern Syria.

Minneapolis emerges as new epicenter of resistance to Trump: 'ICE wasn't expecting that'
subhead: For several weeks, Minnesota's largest metropolitan area has been living under the strain of Operation Metro Surge, which saw the deployment of 2,000 Immigration and Customs Enforcement officers. Since the death of Renee Good on January 7, tensions with residents have reached a peak.

title: Yann Le Cun: 'Why I'm leaving Meta to launch my own AI start-up'
subhead: The former head of artificial intelligence research at Meta explains his decision to start a new company focused on the physical world, citing strategic differences with the American tech giant and predicting a 'third AI revolution' in the coming years.

title: From Monroe to Trump: Two centuries of US interference in Latin America
subhead: From the Monroe Doctrine of 1823 to the intervention in Venezuela, Washington has dominated the American continent by force and through economic power. Faced with China's growing influence, Donald Trump has rejuvenated the notion of a 'manifest destiny.'
